獲.definition: (literary) to catch; to capture; (literary) to get; to obtain; to win

獲利.definition: profit; to obtain benefits; benefits obtained

獲取.definition: to gain; to get; to acquire

獲嘉.definition: Huojia county in Xinxiang 新鄉|新乡[Xin1 xiang1], Henan

獲嘉縣.definition: Huojia county in Xinxiang 新鄉|新乡[Xin1 xiang1], Henan

獲報.definition: to receive a report; to receive intelligence, information etc

獲得.definition: to obtain; to receive; to get

獲悉.definition: to learn of sth; to find out; to get news

獲救.definition: to be rescued; to be saved

獲益.definition: to profit from sth; to get benefit

獲知.definition: to learn of (an event); to hear about (sth)

獲罪.definition: to be deemed guilty; to be convicted

獲贈.definition: to receive; to be given; to be presented with
